root.text:
Hi all, question regarding setting up the auto top up job's environment variables. What's the value of `ISSUER` supposed to be?
`ISSUER` party id - is this supposed to be our wallet's party id that received the commercial agreement or the operator's party id that sent the commercial agreement?

elements.text: Hi all, question regarding setting up the auto top up job's environment variables. What's the value of
ISSUER
supposed to be?
ISSUER
party id - is this supposed to be our wallet's party id that received the commercial agreement or the operator's party id that sent the commercial agreement?

text: Hi <@U03HMUTQ5F0> <@U04KJF6UTNU> would you know the correct answer here by chance?

elements.text: Hi
would you know the correct answer here by chance?

text:
Hello,
We just upgraded CN Utils on our DevNet validator, which had paid credentials setup from the previous version. After the upgrade, the party, which is paying, keeps getting `"No synchronizers satisfy the draft transaction topology requirements"` on all actions. Here is everything we have tried so far
• cancel existing paid credentials - error
• top up - error
• accept new paid credentials - error
Attaching a screenshot with HTTP `400` error

elements.text:
Hello,
We just upgraded CN Utils on our DevNet validator, which had paid credentials setup from the previous version. After the upgrade, the party, which is paying, keeps getting
"No synchronizers satisfy the draft transaction topology requirements"
on all actions. Here is everything we have tried so far
cancel existing paid credentials - error
top up - error
accept new paid credentials - error
Attaching a screenshot with HTTP
error

text: An important note ^: subscriber ran out of funds prior to the upgrade

elements.text: An important note ^: subscriber ran out of funds prior to the upgrade
